channel.title: Forum of Lies 9 (BD and Mercenary Victory!)
channel.description:
# Forum of lies 9 hosted by @Queen_Alfa and Cohosted by @ThePlex & @FadeBlade
# [u]Rules[/u]
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. Respect the host and the players 3. If you haven't posted content in 36 hours, you'll be prodded for inactivity. If you don't respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 4. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 5. Do not screenshot private host messages 6. Don't throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 7. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 8. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for host. 9. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 10. Let's all have fun and play together!
# [u]Gameplay[/u]
1. Days last 96 hours (4 days), or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 48 hours (2 days). 2. All actions, must be sent in your role chat. 3. Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server. 4. Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server. 5. All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the [Class Card Thread.](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-clean-with-no-talking/1998/7).
# [u]Executions[/u]
1. To accuse someone say "/accuse [player]" or "/vote [player]" 2. Votes saying Guilty or Not Guilty before the target is on the stand will not be counted. 3. Should the votes reach the majority, that player will go on trial. They can say a defence, and the rest of the players must vote Guilty or Not Guilty on the thread. 4. Players can discuss while the target is on trial. 5. No one is able to use day powers when a trial is in session. The Only exception is the king’s Decide Fate. 6. Every trial will go on for 24 hours. Only exception is if the king uses decide fate ability. 7. The day timer does not stop when the target is on trial. 8. If the option with the most votes is what happens to the target.
# [u]Picking a new king[/u] 1. If there are less then 4 players a new king will not be selected 2. After a king's execution the day does not end, an election shall be held right after 3. When the king dies 24 hours is given for any player with royal blood to step up and take the throne 4. After that 24 hours anyone is free to step up 5. If only 1 person steps up when the day ends that person becomes the king 6. If 2 people step forward everyone votes on who should be the king. Whoever has the most votes during the end of the day becomes the king. if the votes are tired whoever stepped up 1st becomes the king
# [u]Journals and Deathnotes[/u]
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone. For Death notes, you can use an image you've created on paint.
# [u]Classes in use[/u]
[FoL Class Cards](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-clean-with-no-talking/1998/7)
# [u]To Join[/u]
* To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want. If you've never played before and have decent experience in the official Throne of Lies game, you can reserve a slot by sending a direct message to myself or Alfa!
Players: 1. **NozBugz** 2. **Simon** 3. **PokemonKidRyan** 4. **PolikShadowbliss** 5. **Damafaud** 6. **orangeandblack5** 7. **JammySplodge** 8. **Moleland** 9. **AfterTech [king]** 10. **eevee** 11. **Rogue** 12. **Sketch** 13. **RobeStringFace** 14. **Wolfy** 15. **Ashe** 16. **Insanity**
Back ups: 1. Das_model
# [u]Graveyard:[/u]
* **PokemonKidRyan [color=steblue]The Maid[/color] - Killed on N1** * **Damafaud [color=orange]The Demon[/color] - Exeuted on D2** * **RopeStringFace [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color] - Killed on N2** * **Rogue [color=darkred]The Acolyte[/color] - Executed on D3** * **Eevee [color=darkred]The Seeker[/color] - Killed on N3** * **Insanity [color=steblue]The Prince[/color] - Killed on N3** * **PolikShadowbliss [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color] - Executed on D4** * **Aftertech [color=grey]The Cowardly King[/color] - Executed on D5** * **Moleland [color=lighblue]The Paladin[/color] - Killed on D6** * **Sketch [color=lighblue]The Deputy[/color] - Executed on D6** * **orangeandblack5 [color=darkred]The Cult Leader[/color] - Executed on D7** # [u]Timer[/u] *
# [u]Timestamps[/u]
* [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-1-accepting-backups/2337/59?u=queen_alfa]Day 1 Start (Confirming phase)[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-1-confirming-stage-accepting-backups/2337/140?u=queen_alfa]Start of Night 1[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-2-accepting-backups/2337/143?u=queen_alfa]Start of Day 2[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-2-accepting-backups/2337/967?u=queen_alfa]Trial of Damafaud[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-night-2-accepting-backups/2337/1151?u=queen_alfa]Execution of Damafaud and Start of Night 2[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-3-accepting-backups/2337/1152?u=queen_alfa] Start of Day 3[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-3-accepting-backups/2337/1211?u=queen_alfa]Trial of Rogue[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-night-3-accepting-backups/2337/1334?u=queen_alfa]Execution of Rogue and the start of Night 3[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-4-accepting-backups/2337/1336?u=queen_alfa]Start of Day 4[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-4-accepting-backups/2337/1527?u=queen_alfa]Trial of PolikShadowbliss[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-4-accepting-backups/2337/1650?u=queen_alfa]Execution of PolikShadowbliss and start of Night 4[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-5-accepting-backups/2337/1652?u=queen_alfa]Start of Day 5[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-5-accepting-backups/2337/1720]Execution of King Aftertech[/url] * [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-9-day-6-accepting-backups/2337/1871?u=theplex]Execution of Deputy Sketch[/url]

item.title: Forum of Lies 9 (BD and Mercenary Victory!)
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
?

Are you talking about the Physician to Healer thing? That wasn’t nonsense though. I was using process of what there could be. The fact there was no Cult death when they made a kill before, that was because I was thinking healer. Obviously, after finding out that Orange was Psychic here, that disappointed me because I thought I had a good idea there.

But Mole, people need to remember, Cult can avoid death at least once when making a kill.

Read full topic
